product_description: Ankle-baring hems complete the laid-back look of five-pocket skinnies cut from comfortable stretch denim.
product_details_and_care:
Ankle-baring hems complete the laid-back look of five-pocket skinnies cut from comfortable stretch denim.
27 1/2" inseam; 11" leg opening; 10 3/4" front rise (size 10).
Zip fly with button closure.
Five-pocket style.
Dark dye may transfer to lighter materials.
86% cotton, 11% polyester, 3% spandex.
Dry clean or hand wash warm, tumble dry low.
By Karen Kane; made in the USA.
Available online only.
Item #5132781
